events.name: Grails48 - Dallas
events.about: Grails48 is a global community hackathon series and startup mentorship program. Our first event newbie is taking place Nov 9-11th, 2012 online and in various locations. The purpose of Grails48 is to bring the Grails world together igniting innovation with our favorite JVM based tools and platforms.

events.name: Ready.Set () {Code} Challenge  - Dallas, TX
events.about:
Ready.Set () {Code} Challenge

 

Headphones on. Tilt the seat back. Just steady codin’ as the keys get tapped. Get ready, because Nokia Developer is about to turn your town into Dev City with its Ready.Set () {Code} Challenge.

 

We are hitting the road to 13-cities looking for developers who want to build an experience not just another app. To kick off the Ready.Set () {Code} Challenge, Nokia Developer will hold hackathons across the US and Canada beginning in May. You can sign up individually or form your own team to build the coolest, baddest apps for the Windows Phone platform and Nokia Lumia devices.

 

Prizes will be awarded on site at each event for the top 3 created apps, top student created app, and most Nokia-branded developer (use your imagination). App winners will be judged on creativity, usability, technical difficulty and app presentation.

 

1st place:                                                $500 gift card & Nokia Lumia 900

2nd place:                                               $250 gift card & Nokia Lumia 900

3rd place:                                               $100 gift card & Nokia Lumia 900

Student Winner:                                   $150 gift card & Nokia Lumia 900

Most Nokia-Branded Dev:                  $100 gift card & Nokia Lumia 900

 

At Nokia, we don’t have ordinary developers, so these won’t be ordinary hacks. We have some amazing experiences in store – like our Re-Charge Room - for developers to chill out between pounding out code. So come showoff your skills and earn rewards. Space will be limited so register early.

The Challenge is on. . . .Ready.Set () {Code}

 

Ready.Set () {Code} Challenge Schedule:

08:30 a.m.             Light breakfast and registration

09:00 a.m.             Welcome and competition overview

09:30 a.m.             Let the hacking begin!

12:30 p.m.             Lunch

07:00 p.m.             Show us your app/Dinner

08:00 p.m.             Winners announced

 

See rules here:

http://www.callingallinnovators.com/readysetchallenge/Dallas

events.name: Pocketstop Hackathon
events.about:
This is a Wordpress Hackathon engineered to find the next developer for Pocketstop. It will be a day filled with hacking, networking, food, drinks and general tomfoolery. The winner of the hackathon will have the chance to receive a job offer from Pocketstop as our next developer and a sweet new iPad for your messenger bag.

Pocketstop is a kickass company headquartered in Dallas, Texas. The Basement Headquarters is where we execute our plan to take over the world of mobile, social and digital. Our quest is to “organize human behavior” in order to build fanatical loyalty. Our clients are fun to work with and we operate with surgeon-like precision using the latest and greatest technology.

Pocketstop is what it would be like if Google owned a marketing agency and that agency where headquartered in Dallas, TX and intent on taking over the world. Here’s a list of tricks up our sleeve: SMS text messaging, mobile web, mobile apps, QR Codes, Geo-location, Facebook, Foursquare, LinkedIn, Twitter, interactive screen services and the list goes on and on.

What it is...
Our Hackathon will expose you to our platform, APIs and tricks of the trade. You’ll also get to meet our team and work from within Basement HQ. We’ll supply all of the fuel (food and drink) you will need to complete the journey. This is not a mud run. This is a Hackathon, so come prepared.

WHEN: Friday May 18 9am - 9pm

WHERE: Pocketstop HQ 5646 Milton Street

Suite 100 LL Dallas, TX 75206

In addition to reserving a spot with your ticket, PLEASE REGISTER NOW at www.future.pocketstop.com/hackathon

events.name: BeMyApp Dallas - The 2012 Mobile App Olympics - Hackathon Competition
events.about:
A mobile app design & development competition. Find the skills and inspiration to turn your app idea into a reality in just 48 hours, while competing with a global community in San Francisco, New York, Berlin, London, and Paris.

App Challenge

Follow mobile app news & updates by BeMyApp

  •  Facebook
  •  Twitter
  •  Google+
  •  BeMyapp.com

On Friday evening, registered idea generators have one minute to pitch an app concept to a tech audience. Attending designers and engineers as well as our team of glorious mentors vote for the best ideas that will be developed into applications during the weekend.

Teams are formed around the most promising projects and the competition begins. On Sunday evening, the teams will present to a panel of celebrity judges and to the victors will go the spoils (our awesome sponsored prizes).

Download the detailed schedule [pdf] to learn more.

2012 Mobile App Olympics

This BeMyApp Weekend is dedicated to all platforms - both native and mobile web apps. It will take place simultaneously in 7 cities around the world. 

Sign up for: Dallas · New York · San Francisco · Berlin ·London · Paris · Zurich

Each city will nominate its best app to compete in the finals. A 48-hour worldwide vote will be launched and a worldwide winner will be selected. The winner will receive the 2012 Gold Medal in Mobile Apps! 

Examples and Past Success Stories

  • Namerick
  • Beatable

Confirmed Prizes

The best prize youll get is the connections you forge and the challenge you conquer. That said, weve got some pretty sweet cherry-on-top prizes planned too: 
Squarespace Business Package ($480 value) · iPhone Boot Camp Ticket ($910 value) · Coverage by top tech bloggers (priceless)

Technologies and Tools You Might Use

iOS - iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch · HTML5 · Android (Ice Cream Sandwich) · Windows Phone 7 (WP7) · bada

Objective-C (ObjC) · Mono · Javascript · JQuery · Java · C# 

OpenGL ·  Unity 3D  · WebGL · XAML

JSON · XML

Xcode · Sencha · Eclipse · Visual Studio · Photoshop · Illustrator · Keynote

Game · Utility · Social - Twitter, Facebook · API · Location-based · Gamification

All apps built during the WeekEnd belong to the participants only (we take no ownership, promise).

Got questions or interested in sponsoring? Holler at ben@getliq#uid.com
